text: if you've seen any global news over the

Lebanon happens to be one of my favorite

to be back for a third time but the

epic weeks in Syria I'm a bit thrown off

border what is happening right now in

politics I decided to hit the streets
and interview various locals to get
their thoughts this is a true revolution
now in Lebanon and all the people from
different areas from different political
parties are in on the streets and
demanding the right to have a proper
education system a proper health care a
proper government we're having a lot of
problems here with the government like
everything is just

but now it's a problem for us because

you see the goosebumps
